ComicInfo.Summary:
Faith goes looking for her missing family, while the rest of the harbinger trainees try not drown in a puddle of necromantic ooze! But it's not until a worldwide catastrophe shuts down all technology on Earth that they're really in trouble. What is the source of the Chaos Effect?
Storyline: The Chaos Effect - Delta.
1st. Appearance:
The Visitor
